scripts.build:tsoa: tsoa spec-and-routes --basePath /api/v1 && npm run build:tsoa:fix && npm run build:tsoa:fix2
scripts.build:tsoa:fix: jq 'walk(if type == "object" and .format? == "bigint" then .type = "string" else . end)' build/spec_tsoa.json > build/spec.json
scripts.build:copyspec: cp -r build/api.ts build/schema.d.ts src/api/types ../vite/src/lib/api/ && cp build/spec.json ../cli/spec.json
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:tsoa && npm run build:docs && npm run build:client
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:prisma && npm run typecheck && npm run compile
scripts.dev:startdb: docker start pg-dabih || docker run -d --name pg-dabih -p 5432:5432 -v "./data/postgres:/var/lib/postgresql/data"  --env-file .env.dev postgres:17-alpine
scripts.dev:stopdb: docker stop pg-dabih && docker rm pg-dabih
scripts.dev:startredis: docker start redis-dabih || docker run -d --name redis-dabih -p 6379:6379 redis:alpine
scripts.dev:stopredis: docker stop redis-dabih && docker rm redis-dabih
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && npm run dev:startdb && sleep 1 && npm run dev:startredis && npm run dev:start
scripts.test:stopdb: docker stop pg-dabih-test && docker rm pg-dabih-test
scripts.test:startredis: docker start redis-dabih-test || docker run -d --name redis-dabih-test -p 6380:6379 redis:alpine
scripts.test:stopredis: docker stop redis-dabih-test && docker rm redis-dabih-test
scripts.test:init: npm run test:clean && npm run test:startdb && sleep 1 && npm run test:startredis && npm run test:prepare
scripts.test:reset: npm run test:stopdb && npm run test:stopredis
scripts.test: npm run test:init && npm run test:api || true  && npm run test:reset
